content: (Served with 1-egg omelette) 1 pancake of your choice, 1 waffle of your choice, 2 omelettes of your choice (4 toppings maximum per omelette), 2 crispy turkey bacon, sautéed sausages, and 3 slices of toast.

name: TT's Supreme Breakfast Platter
